short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalistic JSON viewer built using open-source components!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Makes JSON easy to read. Open source. Built on top of the very familiar Monaco editor, same as the one being used in VS Code.

Auto-detects JSON when you load it in a browser tab.

Features:
Syncs theme automatically with browser theme
Syntax highlighting
Bracket pairing and color highlighting
Collapsible trees, with indent guides
Clickable Links
Works on any valid JSON page â€“ URL doesn't matter

Note: this extension might clash with other browser extensions that modify the DOM before it runs. If it doesn't seem to be working, try disabling other extensions. If it clashes with an extension you need, open an issue and I'll try to find a solution.
